so anyway back in the early 80s I shot a

we everybody loves the dailies the

you know they have arms like this so

that's sawed about a quarter of the way

and I try to work all that stuff in and

you know and he then he does his stunts

well anyway choo-choo gets up on roni
and he Lopes out there do the stunt and
I'm really kind of anxious about it and
he what we call over and unders if he

choo-choo flips out of the saddle

he he lost half an ear he hid the truth

and but these guys are what they call

limbs are this way and that and
